entries.title: No more airplane mode? EU to allow calls on flights
entries.description: EU airlines will be able to install equipment that lets them provide 5G on board planes by June 2023.

entries.title: Kanye West no longer to buy Parler social media platform
entries.description: The rapper has repeatedly made anti-Semitic remarks, alienating business partners and fans.

entries.title: India seizes opportunities in African healthcare
entries.description: The rapid expansion of Indian healthcare firms in Africa has not been without problems.
